description:
The WBC Cup begins, and Gao and his rivals fight to become the Best 8 of Cho-Tokyo. Bal becomes convinced that the only way to win is to increase one`s luck. As Noboru battles Gaito, he`s forced to face some hard truths about destiny and luck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Here! WBC Cup Cho-Tokyo Championship!
キタァー! WBCカップ超東驚大会!!
